description:
The action is over-the-top as Date and Yukimura take on a group of disguised fighters. While Date may realize the the masked men are actually Sasuke, Takeda, and Kojuro, Yukimura appears to have no clue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dragon and Tiger: Oath of Victory! Souls Racing Towards a Blazing Future!!
Ryuuko, Itadaki no Chikai! Atsuki Mirai e Kakeru Tamashii!!
竜虎, 頂の誓い! 熱き未来へ駆ける魂!!
